Hi question - i downloaded Atlas free from marketplace. I have cloned it and have been editing it successfully until I got to 'blog post' template. Can someone please explain in a simple way how i can make this template more fluid? How can I add the 'sections' and 'modules' to this in the same way i can ALL of the other pages?

I have tried to add code from a module, I've tired adding my own raw code to it.. nothing is showing up, everything i add to it just shows in prod as a white block? Can someone just tell me how I can open up the CMS editor to have more options? I just want to add two modules from the website template . it seems i can't add anything to this? very frustrated.

â€¢ to add: i'm getting Error:The template can't contain "dnd_area" modules. Please remove "hero_section_blog" on line 56.      when i'm trying to add a dnd section. How do i get around this????
Blog Post templates don't support dnd sections. You can directly drag modules inside the blog post body area if required using the post editor screen.
